Matthias Vongerichten

Software & Data Engineer, Berlin, DE

tl;dr: LinkedIn || Malt

About Me

I cared about building Mercedes-Benz 🚗 software for almost a decade, I'm now integrating data 📄 at ARMEDANGELS 👼, doing my Masters in Computer Science and planning to use my powers to help the common good 💖 & to protect the environment 🌿. I like Python, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Kubernetes and flirt with Rust & AI (of course!) for my next adventures. Current hobbies are running & strength training, learning vim 👨‍💻 and transitioning to an eco-friendly lifestyle.

Want me for freelance work? You can contact 📧 me in english, german and you can also try hungarian.

"We must all suffer one of two things: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret or disappointment."

– Jim Rohn

Experience

ARMEDANGELS

Data Engineer - Feb, 2022 - Present

  • Introduced unit tests into the Airflow environment (Python)
  • Refactored Airflow DAGs and Operators (Python)
  • Transformed XML files (XSLT, Python)
  • Created and maintained a system landscape (diagrams.net, UML)
  • Built BI reports and dashboards (Looker, Excel, DAX)
  • Maintained and extended the data model/data warehouse (dbt, Snowflake, SQL)
  • Integrated several partner services (Python, Airflow, WSDL, REST)

Software Engineer & Technical Product Owner - May, 2017 - Sep, 2021

  • Modernizing the MB Vans Configurator tech stack by means of the followingâ€¦

    • Migration to a container orchestration platform (Kubernetes)
